page.title: 20FAMILY LIFE APPLETON WISKE
page.content: The family reassemblefor the evening meal around 6pm usually they have some form of meat plus two vegetables followed by a sweet or cheese.Before the meal the children will have practiced thier musical instruments, Ruth the flute and Faye the oboe.Ruth will probably have some homework to do.As it is a wednesday Faye will be off to Brownies in Village Hall at 6.30pm.Derek will go to Morris Dancing Practice in Yarm about 7.30pm and Tricia may have a Yorkshire Countrywomen's Association Meeting in the Village Hall at the same time so a baby-sitter will be required.The children will go to bed about 9pm before their parents return. Faye Partington
